headline: GE HealthCare collaborates with two major medical systems to advance AI technology designed to transform hospital operations and improve patient care
summary: CHICAGO, October 20, 2025--GE HealthCare (Nasdaq: GEHC) today announced collaborations with two leading U.S. health systems—The Queen’s Health Systems in Honolulu, HI and Duke Health in Durham, NC—to help advance the development of GE HealthCare’s new AI-driven hospital operations software. Both health systems plan to contribute their frontline expertise to inform GE HealthCare’s forthcoming cloud-first Software as a Service solution that will be part of GE HealthCare’s CareIntellect family of a

content.title: GE HealthCare collaborates with two major medical systems to advance AI technology designed to transform hospital operations and improve patient care
